statements: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM Invoice WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date FROM Invoice WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Invoice ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Invoice WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE payment_status = FALSE ORDER BY invoice_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Invoice WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Invoice GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM Invoice WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM Invoice WHERE customer_id = 'e323c854-af0d-4e7a-a062-4ffb6092d29f' ORDER BY invoice_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_amount, invoice_date FROM billing_info;
SELECT customer_id, invoice_id, invoice_amount FROM billing_info ORDER BY invoice_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounting_system WHERE transaction_type = 'payment';
SELECT transaction_id, invoice_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM accounting_system ORDER BY transaction_amount;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE invoice_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, invoice_amount FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT invoice_id, transaction_amount AS amount_paid, transaction_type FROM accounting_system WHERE transaction_type = 'payment' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_amount, due_date FROM billing_info WHERE due_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY due_date ASC, invoice_amount DESC;
SELECT b.invoice_id, b.invoice_amount, a.transaction_date, a.transaction_type FROM billing_info b JOIN accounting_system a ON b.invoice_id = a.invoice_id WHERE a.transaction_amount >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, invoice_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payments WHERE amount_paid > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as num_invoices FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, id
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000

SELECT products.product_name, products.unit_price, transactions.transaction_date FROM products JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE transactions.amount_paid > 50
SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, invoices.total_amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.id = invoices.customer_id WHERE invoices.invoice_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT DISTINCT customers.name, customers.email, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.id = invoices.customer_id JOIN transactions ON invoices.invoice_id = transactions.invoice_id JOIN products ON transactions.transaction_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01' AND invoice_amount < 500 ORDER BY invoice_amount DESC;
